snippet: A defense witness who supervised Staff Sgt. Robert Bales, charged with murdering 16 Afghan civilians, called him “a soldier’s leader” in testimony, in contrast to prosecutors’ portrayal of him as a methodical killer.
abstract: Defense witness who supervised Staff Sgt Robert Bales, charged with murdering 16 civilians in Afghanistan, describes him as an outstanding leader, in contrast to prosecutors' portrayal of him as methodical killer; dual portraits of Bales complicate case as it moves forward.
lead_paragraph: A defense witness who supervised Staff Sgt. Robert Bales, charged with murdering 16 Afghan civilians, called him “a soldier’s leader” in testimony, in contrast to prosecutors’ portrayal of him as a methodical killer.

headline.seo: Conflicting Views Emerge of Sergeant Charged in Afghan Killings
headline.main: Conflicting Views Emerge of Sergeant Charged in Afghan Killings
headline.print_headline: Two Views of Officer Emerge in Afghan Case
